General.Name: Mirae Asset Life Insurance Co Ltd
General.Description: Mirae Asset Life Insurance Co., Ltd. provides life insurance, personal insurance, reinsurance contracts, and retirement products in South Korea. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 41 branches and 104 agencies. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: 56, International Financial Street, Seoul, South Korea, 07330
